data.comment: Today's referee, Carlos Del Cerro Grande, has blown to start the match.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
In the minute 2, Alaves to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
Granada have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Granada.
In the minute 4, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Alaves throw-in in Granada's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
In the minute 6, Granada to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Roberto Soldado.
In the minute 7, Great play from Darwin Machis to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Alaves throw-in in Granada's half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for Granada in Granada.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Alaves.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 15, Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
Granada have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
In the minute 17, In Granada, Granada push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
In the minute 19, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a throw-in for Alaves, close to Granada's area.
Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Free kick in a good position for Alaves!
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Joselu.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 24, Edgar Mendez for Alaves has been booked by Carlos Del Cerro Grande and receives a first yellow card.
Granada drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Alaves.
In the minute 26, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Rodrigo Battaglia (Alaves) has received a yellow card from Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Alaves throw-in in Granada's half.
In the minute 28, Alaves have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In Granada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Granada.
Corner awarded to Granada.
Yangel Herrera's header is off-target for Granada.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Granada.
Granada have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Can Granada capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 34, Granada's Luis Milla misses with an attempt on goal.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Alaves a goal kick.
Can Granada capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Alaves's half?
In the minute 36, Granada are pushing forward but Antonio Puertas's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Granada.
Granada to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 39, Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Granada.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Free kick Granada.
Free kick for Granada in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Granada in the half of Alaves.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Alaves a goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Alaves drive upfield and Joselu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Granada defender.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Ximo Navarro is replacing Rodrigo Ely for the away team.
In the minute 46, Alaves make their second substitution with Ruben Duarte replacing Abdallahi Mohamed Mahmound.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
In Granada Granada's Roberto Soldado is caught offside.
In the minute 48, Granada are caught offside.
Free kick Granada.
At Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes, Florian Lejeune has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Yangel Herrera returns to the field for Granada after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 50, Carlos Del Cerro Grande waits before resuming play because Yangel Herrera for Granada is still down.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 53, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Granada throw-in in Alaves's half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Granada to check on Ruben Duarte, who is grimacing with pain.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dimitri Foulquier.
In the minute 55, Dimitri Foulquier has recovered and rejoins the match in Granada.
Ruben Duarte is back on the pitch.
Granada to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Alaves.
Throw-in for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Antonio Puertas for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Granada.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Throw-in for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
Diego Martinez is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes with Angel Montoro replacing Antonio Puertas.
In the minute 64, Robert Kenedy (Granada) has replaced the possibly injured Yangel Herrera at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Granada needs to be cautious. Alaves have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 66, Granada have a goal kick.
Granada have a goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a throw-in for Granada, close to Alaves's area.
In the minute 70, Alaves will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Granada.
Corner awarded to Granada.
In Granada, Angel Montoro (Granada) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 72, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Alaves a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
The away team have replaced Luis Rioja with Borja Sainz. This is the third substitution made today by Pablo Machin.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Alaves.
Granada have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
In the minute 75, Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
Darwin Machis scores to make it 2-1 at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
In the minute 81, In Granada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Angel Montoro of Granada gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Granada.
Diego Martinez (Granada) is making a third substitution, with German Sanchez replacing Darwin Machis.
In the minute 84, The home team replace Roberto Soldado with Jorge Molina.
Important block from the Granada defence as Deyverson fires in a strike for Alaves.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Alaves.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Throw-in Alaves.
In the minute 88, John Guidetti is on a sub for Edgar Mendez for Alaves.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Granada.
Robert Kenedy (Granada) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ximo Navarro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Alaves.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Granada.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Granada.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Granada throw-in in Alaves's half.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Granada make their fifth substitution with Victor Diaz replacing Luis Milla.
